thread.title: Walking to the right beat to stay healthy

title: Walking to the right beat to stay healthy
text:
Walking to the right beat to stay healthy 12:35pm GMT - 00:56 
South Korean company Wearable Healthcare Inc says its Ruawalk product is the world's first music-guided walking tempo controller, designed to improve users' mood and fitness. Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
South Korean company Wearable Healthcare Inc says its Ruawalk product is the world's first music-guided walking tempo controller, designed to improve users' mood and fitness. Jim Drury reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CLPofx
